string.text: Hello, Bookmaker. I'd like to place a bet, want to raise some dough.

Well, good business, just note: here it's either make or break - since you can bet 50 grand, but win only 500 rubles. And then, either pay - hustle however you want, and if you can't - into debt slavery... Or one day they'll find someone's corpse in the swamp... That's how it is.
Yeah, a bit harsh... However, gambling is such a thing. So what?
Are you asking me? Want to risk - risk, your right. So, the choice is yours, Stalker.
Alright, what are the conditions?

The bet is taken and is non-refundable. You will be informed about the win or loss... You can also play on credit, but hefty interest will accrue on the debt amount. Every 12 hours. So the choice is yours: to play or not to play. By the way, in case of winning - you can leave the money with me: I'll give a good percentage.
Alright, I agree. What are the bets?
Bets change constantly, like the wind from Pripyat. Even I sometimes don't know which one will be today. Right now here is such a bet.
Bet is one thousand. We bet on whether another rookie stalker will get out of the anomaly trap at the Swamps or not, where he fell yesterday while drunk.
Bet is 5 thousand. We bet on whether another loser will manage to return the debt to Timon Bonesetter before the designated deadline or not.
Bet is 10 thousand. We bet on who of these two rookie idiots will first find and bring the "Stone Flower" for Gera of Tula.
Bet is 15 thousand. We bet on who of these two regular upstarts will first get to the stash of the deceased Badger at the Garbage.

Bet is 20 thousand. We bet on who of two rookies will win in the nearest knife sparring. Go to the Cordon, maybe you'll make it to this fight. Although, the spectacle is so-so - two regular juvenile morons decided to play heroes.

Bet is 25 thousand. We bet on luck or failure: two regular idiots decided to bolt from the Zone and went to the Checkpoint, to bow to the military. As for me, that's two new corpses, but you decide yourself.

Bet is 30 thousand. We bet on another "braggart". He promised to bring Wolf the head of a chimera. I think he'll crap himself at the mere sight of it. Although... Who knows, they say he handles a knife not badly.

Bet is 35 thousand. We bet on interest: egghead scientists sent their regular courier to the Dead City with a parcel for the Wanderers. Many think he won't make it, but the choice is yours. Who knows, maybe they tamed a mutant and dressed it in a spacesuit. And now he runs errands for them.
Bet is 40 thousand. Good bet, large one... We bet on one psycho, who promised Knyaz, against his debt, to scrounge five bottles of whiskey from the Peacekeepers.

Bet is 50 thousand. We bet big: one experienced stalker, however, how many of them there were already, promised the Informer to catch and drag in a live bloodsucker. He is either crazy, or a hero like never seen before.
I refuse.
Well that's it - the bet is made, now wait for the message. Good luck, Stalker!
Alright, I'll be going...
Did you fall from an oak tree or what, guy? You owe more than a hundred grand and you are forbidden to make bets. Come on, move your tomatoes out of here.
You are mean...
Hello, I came for the money.
Let's see now what is due to you there.
Well come on, don't stretch the rubber. Get the dough out.
Wait... Now... Let's open the safe first.
Take the money.
Leave for storage.
Good day to you. Here, came to pay off the debt.
Alright - there is no debt on you anymore. You are free.
Take the deposit.
Choose how much you want to withdraw.
Withdraw 10% of the sum.
Withdraw half of the sum.
Withdraw the whole sum.
Well, hold it.
Thanks for keeping it well. I'll go relax a little.
